function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c=="O" then oxyd(i-1,line) set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line)
elseif c=="#" then set_stone("st-plain",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="X" then set_stone("st-plain_break",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="B" then set_stone("st-plain_move",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line,{secure=true}) set_item("it-burnable_oil",i-1,line) elseif c=="F" then set_stone("st-firebreak",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line,{secure=true}) elseif c=="Y" then set_stone("st-break_invisible",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line,{secure=true}) elseif c=="G" then set_stone("st-grate1",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line,{secure=true}) set_item("it-burnable_oil",i-1,line) elseif c=="Z" then set_stone("st-plain_break",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) set_item("it-cross",i-1,line) elseif c=="H" then set_stone("st-grate1",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line,{secure=true})
elseif c==" " then set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="~" then set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line)
elseif c=="h" then set_item("it-hammer",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="d" then set_item("it-dynamite",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="p" then set_item("it-pencil",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="b" then set_item("it-brush",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="c" then set_item("it-cross",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="o" then set_item("it-burnable_oil",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line,{secure=true}) end end end
